string.name: EmptyGuidException
string.value: A GUID value that is not empty (all zeroes) must be supplied for this operation.

string.name: EventNotSupportedException
string.value: The supplied event is not supported by this object.

string.name: NumericValueRequiredException
string.value: The required argument requires a numeric value.

string.name: ArgumentExceedsMaximumLengthException
string.value: The given argument exceeds the maximum allowed length.

string.name: ArgumentExceedsMaximumLengthWithValueException
string.value: The given argument exceeds the maximum allowed length. The maximum allowed length is {0}.

string.name: InvalidTypeException
string.value: Invalid type encountered. Was expecting type {0} but encountered {1}.

string.name: ArgumentLessThanZeroException
string.value: Value cannot be less than zero.

string.name: DefaultServiceLocatorNotConfiguredException
string.value: No default service locator is specified. Please register one at startup.

string.name: CommandHandlerNotFoundException
string.value: No command handlers were found for command type {0}.

string.name: TreeIndexCannotExceedChildrenCountException
string.value: Requested node index cannot be higher than last child index.

string.name: TreeNodeCircularReferenceException
string.value: Circular reference detected. Ensure child node is not the same instance as the root node.

string.name: TreeNodeParentAlreadyAssignedException
string.value: Current node already has parent assigned.

string.name: TreeNodeDisconnectException
string.value: Cannot disconnect root node from a parent.

string.name: TreeNodeDuplicateKeysDetectedException
string.value: One or more values contains {0} duplicate keys. The first duplicate key detected is [{1}].

string.name: TreeNodeDuplicateKeysDetectedException_NoKey
string.value: One or more values contains duplicate keys.

string.name: TreeNodeSameIdAndParentIdException
string.value: At least one value has the same ID and parent ID: [{0}].

string.name: TreeNodeSameIdAndParentIdException_NoId
string.value: At least one value has the same ID and parent ID.

string.name: TreeNodeParentIdNotFoundException
string.value: A value has the parent ID [{0}] but no other nodes has this ID.

string.name: TreeNodeParentIdNotFoundException_NoId
string.value: Could not locate node with the specified parent ID.

string.name: NullObjectException
string.value: A null instance or property was encountered when a value was expected.

string.name: CollectionRestrictionViolationException
string.value: Unable to add item(s) to the collection because it violates a collection restriction, such as a parent object mismatch or range requirement.

string.name: NoWhippetSettingGroupsExistForApplicationException
string.value: No setting groups exist for the specified application.

string.name: MultipleParameterValuesException
string.value: Multiple values supplied for one parameter.

string.name: ConcreteClassTypeRequiredException
string.value: A concrete class type is required for this operation with a public constructor.

string.name: MissingParameterException
string.value: Could not locate one ore more parameters. Missing parameters were {0}.

string.name: DuplicateEntityException
string.value: Could not add the entity to the data store as an instance already exists and would cause data duplication.
